title: itallcanwait
author: itallcanwait
content: White-Label NFT Marketplace Solution by 4IREAre you looking for a scalable NFT marketplace solution for your crypto business? With 4IRE ready-to-go platform, you can start selling, buying, and creating NFTs in as little as three weeks. The solution is customizable to cater to specific NFT categories such as music, games, art, sports, and more.Solution Overview4IRE's NFT platform is highly flexible and designed to meet your specific business requirements. It offers a comprehensive set of essential features attractive for businesses focused on cryptocurrency including:Ready-to-use payment gateway;Third-party payment providing;Storefront;Second market and royalties options;NFT collection creation;Wallet connection;Multi-currency support;Address whitelisting;Lazy minting;Buying and bidding;Buy and sell stats of the marketplace;Search by collection, user, NFT;Opensea compatibility;Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatibility.4IRE white-label NFT solution integrates with the third-party payment provider Transac. Also, it includes a greatly enhanced user experience by adding proprietary platform tokens.White-Label NFT Marketplace Transfer ProcessBy choosing 4IRE's pre-engineered NFT marketplace solution, you can avoid the hassle of developing a platform from scratch and start earning profits before your competitors. 4IRE ready-to-go NFT solution should be running in a weeks after the purchase. The following steps are needed to launch the solution:Deployment and code fragments documentation; settings documentation;Code of the product itself;Kubernetes cluster that runs in the customerâ€™s AWS and raises all marketplace services;Smart contract code for deploying them to the main net chosen by the customer;Moreover, the platform integrates with the third-party payment provider Transac and offers the option to add a proprietary platform token for an enhanced user experience. In fact, These steps are the final preparations before launch and take significantly less time than starting an NFT marketplace from scratch.If you are looking for a reliable and efficient NFT marketplace solution, 4IRE's white-label platform is a perfect choice.Visit our website so our specialist can provide you with more relevant information about our White-Label NFT marketplace Solution. Website: https://4irelabs.com/white-label-nft-marketplace/
